Ok, but are the songs here from the deluxe version? I mean, there is a separated torrent for the Bonus tracks, but there are other differences, like the song "Bad Kids" where they cutted part of the song in the Standard Edition, but not on the Deluxe one. Which one is this?
Ok, ignore my comment. Bad Kids is the same in both versions, it was just a typo in the lyrics on the album
